A

AbstractApplicationLauncher - Class in se.jguru.nazgul.core.algorithms.launcher.api
Abstract StandardLifecycle implementation, handling command-line arguments, exception printouts and help screens.
AbstractApplicationLauncher(String, String[], String) - Constructor for class se.jguru.nazgul.core.algorithms.launcher.api.AbstractApplicationLauncher
Compound constructor, creating an AbstractApplication instance from the given arguments.
AbstractApplicationLauncher(String, String[], String, List<String>) - Constructor for class se.jguru.nazgul.core.algorithms.launcher.api.AbstractApplicationLauncher
Compound constructor, creating an AbstractApplication instance from the given arguments.
addOptions(Options) - Method in class se.jguru.nazgul.core.algorithms.launcher.api.AbstractApplicationLauncher
Overload this method to add any Command-line Options to be supported by this AbstractApplication.
ApplicationLauncher - Interface in se.jguru.nazgul.core.algorithms.launcher.api
Specification for a standalone JSE application, launched by a main method within the concrete implementation class.

I

isArgumentSupplied(String) - Method in class se.jguru.nazgul.core.algorithms.launcher.api.AbstractApplicationLauncher
Checks if the provided key is given as an argument on the command line or not.

P

printUsage(String) - Method in class se.jguru.nazgul.core.algorithms.launcher.api.AbstractApplicationLauncher
Prints a human-readable usage message for the application, given a status message which can be acquired from an exception or passed by a user given launch requirements (i.e. the user wanting the usage help printed).
printUsage(String) - Method in interface se.jguru.nazgul.core.algorithms.launcher.api.ApplicationLauncher
Prints a human-readable usage message for the application, given a status message which can be acquired from an exception or passed by a user given launch requirements (i.e. the user wanting the usage help printed).

R

runApplication() - Method in interface se.jguru.nazgul.core.algorithms.launcher.api.StandardLifecycle
Implement this method to execute the actual application.

S

se.jguru.nazgul.core.algorithms.launcher.api - package se.jguru.nazgul.core.algorithms.launcher.api
 
StandardLifecycle - Interface in se.jguru.nazgul.core.algorithms.launcher.api
ApplicationLauncher augmentation specification, defining a known set of lifecycle methods for implementation by the concrete application.

V

validateArguments(CommandLine) - Method in interface se.jguru.nazgul.core.algorithms.launcher.api.StandardLifecycle
Implement this method to perform any application-specific validation of the supplied CommandLine arguments.
